name: Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life Is Calling
tagline: After severely burning himself in a drug incident, a comedian has a near death experience in which he reviews his life.

name: Admission
tagline: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

name: Next
tagline: A Las Vegas magician who can see into the future is pursued by FBI agents seeking to use his abilities to prevent a nuclear terrorist attack.

name: The Howling
tagline: After a bizarre and near fatal encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

name: The Glass House
tagline: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

name: The Crow: City of Angels
tagline: Many years after the first film, the spirit of the Crow resurrects another man seeking revenge for the murder of his son.

name: Sibling Rivalry
tagline: A frustrated woman's life gets even more frustrating once she gets into an affair with a man who suffers a fatal heart attack after their fling.

name: Laws of Attraction
tagline: Amidst a sea of litigation, two New York City divorce lawyers find love.

name: Drive Me Crazy
tagline: A high school girl must find a substitute date to escort her to the prom.

name: The Contender
tagline: Sexy secrets from a womans past come to light as she runs for Vice President.

name: School for Scoundrels
tagline: A young guy short on luck, enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when his teacher has the same agenda.

name: Going the Distance
tagline: A romantic comedy centered on a guy and a gal who try to keep their love alive as they shuttle back and forth between New York and San Francisco to see one another.

name: Punch-Drunk Love
tagline: A psychologically troubled novelty supplier is nudged towards a romance with an English woman, all the while being extorted by a phone-sex line run by a crooked mattress salesman, and purchasing stunning amounts of pudding.

name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
tagline: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece on Halloween. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

name: The Rage: Carrie 2
tagline: A massacre strikes up after an outcast girl is taunted by a group of high school jocks, all of them unaware of her violent, cutthroat psychic power.

name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
tagline: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

name: For the Love of Benji
tagline: Benji sniffs out a bogus CIA agent in Athens, Greece.

name: EuroTrip
tagline: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

name: Heavy Weights
tagline: Plump kids are lured into joining a posh fat camp with the promise of quick weight loss and good times, only to find that the facility is a woodland hellhole run by a psycho ex-fitness instructor.

name: The Betsy
tagline: The aging, retired founder of an auto giant comes out of retirement to try to develop a safe, fuel-efficient car.

name: Apollo 18
tagline: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where two American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

name: Kit Kittredge: An American Girl
tagline: Set in Cincinnati at the height of the Great Depression, Kit Kittredge, a resourceful young girl, helps her mother run a boardinghouse after her father loses his job.

name: Frantic
tagline: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

name: Nebraska
tagline: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

name: Parker
tagline: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.

name: The Last King of Scotland
tagline: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s

name: Max Dugan Returns
tagline: An English teacher and struggling single mother has her life disrupted when the father who abandoned her as a child comes back into her life.

name: Furry Vengeance
tagline: In the Oregon wilderness, a real estate developer's new housing subdivision faces a unique group of protesters, local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.

name: The Postman
tagline: A drifter with no name finds a Jeep with the skeleton of a postman and a bag of mail and dons the postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in the post apocalyptic America.

name: Take This Job and Shove It
Hostel: Part II
tagline: Three American college students studying abroad are lured to a Slovakian hostel, and discover the grim reality behind it.

name: Enough Said
tagline: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

name: The Babe
tagline: Babe Ruth becomes a baseball legend but is unheroic to those who know him.

name: Silent Hill: Revelation 3D
tagline: When her father disappears, Heather Mason is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

name: Home for the Holidays
tagline: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

name: A Mighty Wind
tagline: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

name: Notes on a Scandal
tagline: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her 15-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond platonic friendship.

name: Empire
tagline: A successful South Bronx drug dealer turns his back on his roots and gives money to a Wall Street broker to invest for him.

name: Red Planet
tagline: Astronauts search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

name: The Big Lebowski
tagline: "Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

name: The Ruins
tagline: A group of friends whose leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when they, along with a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

name: Dark Skies
tagline: As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them.

name: Disturbing Behavior
tagline: The new kid in town stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

name: Deathtrap
tagline: A Broadway playwright puts murder in his plan to take credit for a student's script.

name: Murder in the First
tagline: An eager and idealistic young attorney defends an Alcatraz prisoner accused of murdering a fellow inmate. The extenuating circumstances: his client had just spent over three years in solitary confinement.

name: The Neverending Story II: The Next Chapter
tagline: A young boy with a distant father enters a world of make-believe and magic through a portal within an antique book.

name: Born in East L.A.
tagline: When a native-born American citizen of Mexican descent is mistakenly deported to Mexico, he has to risk everything to get back home.

name: Masters of the Universe
tagline: A prince turned warrior named He-Man battles against the dark lord Skeletor on the planet Eternia. He-Man and his comrades arrive on Earth and discover two teenage lovers to find the magical Cosmic Key.

name: Just My Luck
tagline: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

name: My Baby's Daddy
tagline: A trio of young men (Griffin, Anderson, and Imperioli) are forced to grow up quick when their girlfriends all become pregnant around the same time.

name: The Phantom
tagline: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African heroes, travels to New York to thwart a criminal genius.

name: Max Keeble's Big Move
tagline: Max Keeble, the victim of his 7th grade class, plots revenge when he learns he's moving; it backfires when he doesn't move after all.

name: Before and After
tagline: Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

name: Inkheart
tagline: A young girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

name: Half Baked
tagline: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

name: A Bronx Tale
tagline: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

name: Eight Legged Freaks
tagline: A variety of horrible poisonous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

name: Fired Up!
tagline: The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory.

name: Wanderlust
tagline: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

name: Hudson Hawk
tagline: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

name: The Mission
tagline: 18th century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American Indian tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

name: Sidekicks
tagline: A bullied teen who fantasizes about being Chuck Norris' sidekick trains in martial arts to fulfill his dreams.

name: Center Stage
tagline: A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

name: Freejack
tagline: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race-car driver to 2009 New York, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

name: Safe
tagline: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

name: Annapolis
tagline: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.

name: Eastern Promises
tagline: A Russian teenager living in London who dies during childbirth leaves clues to a midwife in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

name: Kung Fu Hustle
tagline: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

name: Diabolique
tagline: The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.

name: The Falcon and the Snowman
tagline: The true story of a disillusioned military contractor employee and his drug pusher childhood friend who became walk-in spies for the Soviet Union.

name: Rushmore
tagline: The king of Rushmore prep school is put on academic probation.

name: Fled
tagline: Two prisoners chained together flee during an escape attempt gone bad.

name: Pet Sematary II
tagline: The ancient Indian cemetery with the power to raise the dead returns and influences the lives of new residents.

name: Small Time Crooks
tagline: A loser of a crook and his wife strike it rich when a botched bank job's cover business becomes a spectacular success.

name: Pokémon 3: The Movie
tagline: The Pokemon master Ash must rescue his mother from the encasement of a crystal tower.

name: Ghosts of the Abyss
tagline: James Cameron and Bill Paxton, director and actor of the 1997 film Titanic, travel to the final undersea resting place of the fated ship of dreams.

name: Seed of Chucky
tagline: Chuck (Brad Dourif) and Tiff (Jennifer Tilly) return, resurrected by their son (Billy Boyd), and hit Hollywood in the fifth film of the CHILD'S PLAY series.

name: Son of the Mask

production.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 1 KG

tagline: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.
